posts.post_content: Radiant is amazing. She has an awesome story and she ripped Urza's eyes out of his head. Card is also great too, good price for a flying vigilant that can easily grow.

posts.post_content: Well she is no Baneslayer, but she is still one of the best angels in the game. She is easily a 6/6 flyer with vigilance for five, and can get 10/10 or larger easily in multiplayer games or dedicated decks.

Posted By: atemu1234 (5/1/2012 8:13:39 PM)

posts.post_content:
She has alwase been my favorite angel... She's in charge of Serra's Realm, which is awesome and yet isn't allegedly perfect like Serra herself. This makes her an interesting character...   
  
As for the card, notice that is says "all other creatures with flying" Due to this, I have one word: [Dovescape](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dovescape)  
  
Overall, a nice card by herself, and not broken... She provides both individuality and deck building potential. Final: \*\*\*\* \*/2   
  
The art is a little off for me though (Wings are too short)

posts.post_content:
Radiant is allright. She's costed with Serra Angel in mind, with Legendary cited as a minor drawback.   
She'll be bigger in an aggressive flying strategy. [Pride of the clouds](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Pride of the clouds), Pegasus Stampede, and Spectral Procession make fliers. [Gravitational Shift](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gravitational Shift) is a nice inclusion.

posts.post_content:
This has to be one of my favorite cards of all time. The flavor is just epic. Her story is matched only by how great she plays.  
  
Urza's Saga deserves a comeback like Mirridon got last year. Urza and Serra planeswalkers with the triumphant return of a rework Serra Angel and Radiant? Yes PLEASE.
